Package index

Begin and end call

ipeds_init()
Initialize chained request.
ipeds_get()
Get IPEDS data.

Select and filter variables

ipeds_select()
Select IPEDS data variables.
ipeds_filter()
Filter IPEDS data by variable values.
ipeds_year()
Select scorecard data year.

Search data elements

ipeds_dict()
Search data dictionary.

Downloading files

ipeds_temp_to_disk()
Save downloaded IPEDS files in temporary directory to disk
ipeds_download_to_disk()
Download IPEDS files directly to disk

Utility

ipeds_file_table()
Return a table of all currently available complete data files
